input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Trophy 1st Note Kazoo

Item specifications:
Comes in Red or Blue
Made of Durable Plastic
Hum Your Favorite Tunes
Real Instrument

Product description:
input_text.Response A: If you're looking for a fun and unique way to play your favorite tunes, look no further than the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo! This real instrument is made of durable plastic and comes in red or blue. So whether you're a seasoned musician or just starting out, the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo is sure to bring a little joy to your music-making.
input_text.Response B: The Trophy 1st Note Kazoo comes in Red or Blue and is made of a durable plastic. Hum your favorite tunes with this real instrument kazoo that is sure to impress your friends!

label_annotations.feedback:
A misses out "hum", so anyone not knowing what a kazoo is might get the wrong idea.
B just converts the list to prose - but it reads OK.
